Configuration.Name: ExLibris_Alma_Primo
Configuration.Author: Kun Lin fork fromIDS Project
Configuration.Description: Searches ExLibris Alma/Primo Catalog for ISSN or Title for loans and articles and allows for input of Call Number and Location for Loans into the Details tab of the request.

Setting.name: AutoSearch
Setting.Description: Determines whether or not the search should be done automatically when the request is opened.

Setting.name: StartwithISxN
Setting.Description: Determines whether or not the Addon should start the search with item ISxN.

Setting.name: localurl
Setting.Description: Enter in your shortened URL for your catalog (e.g. http://search.library.northwestern.edu/). Include the colon and port number if part of the string.

Setting.name: AddonRibbonName
Setting.Description: Enter the name that you would like to appear for the tab associated with this Addon (example: Alma) (example:Primo)
